content: What is Python and why is it popular?
Python is popular because basically it is a programming language by which we can integrate AI and also like we it has simple syntax.
Yeah, so basically multiple data types like set, dictionary, list, tuple, string.
What is Django and why use it?
Yeah. So basically Django is like a framework in Python by which we can develop our website and it is a framework for web development.

Basically Jango models are something like it is a by which like we can integrate our database and migration is something like when we want to make changes after writing model PY code. So we run 2 commands Python manager, we make migration and migrate.
What is a Django view? Difference between function-based and class-based views?

Yeah, so we have 2 views. Basically a view is like a brain and when we want to write some logic so we write in it RV function and then we render it or call it by our URL dot PY file and we have U dot PY file also And we can create our view by two types.
How do you handle forms in Django?
Yeah, like we can handle forms in Django by making forms dot PY file.
What is Django ORM? Give an example.
Basically Jango ORM is object relational map in which we just write the Python script and we do not write like the query SQL queries.

Yeah, so basically you are routing is something like when we are using our URL dot BY file and we need to route our URL like if you have a function and we need a view function called interview and we need to redirect it so we just gave the path name.
How do you use templates in Django?

Yeah, basically template is something our front end part like when we want to render some front end part so we use template for it. And template is basically like a HTML and CSS and JavaScript part. And basically templates are something by which we can like integrate.
What is a REST API and how would you implement it in Django?
